pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Glycolic Peel Off 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Peel-off face mask infused with glycolic acid to
erase pigmentation, refine skin’s texture and purify
pores. Glycolic acid gently exfoliates and brightens
skin eliminating dark spots and freckles for an even and
clear complexion. The peel-off mask removes dirt and oil
from deep within the skin’s pores helping to minimise the
appearance of pores.

Warnings

To ensure skin compatibility, it is advisable to test a small area of the skin before use. Use the mask immediately after opening to prevent essence from drying out. CAUTION: For external use only.

Common Uses

Eliminates dark spots and pigmentation
Brightens and evens skin tone
Purifies and minimises the appearance of pores

Ingredients

Water(Aqua), Polyvinyl Alcohol, Alcohol, Glycerin, Titanium Dioxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, PEG-
400, Butylene Glycol, Kaolin, Silica, PVP, Glass, Benzyl Glycol, Allantoin, Bentonite, Niacinamide,
Xanthan Gum, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine,
Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Dextrin, Raspberry Ketone, Morus Alba Fruit Extract, Sea Water, Vaccinium
Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Glycolic Acid, Cyclodextrin, Sodium Chloride, Tin Oxide,
Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Extensin, Fragrance(Parfum).

Directions

 Directions
1. Apply an even layer to clean, dry skin.
2. Avoid eye area, eyebrows, hairline and lips.
3. Leave on for 30 minutes or until completely dry.
4. There should be no tacky areas.
5. Gently peel off mask starting from the outer edges. Wash off any residue with water.
6. Follow with moisturiser or a Skin Republic Face Mask Sheet.
